summary.span: 表示 用于重写其序列化类的默认方式的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects used by the to override the default way it serializes a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 类的 属性返回。The is returned by the property of the class. 通过使用 类和 类，您可以重写 序列化类的默认方式。By using the class and the class, you can override the default way that the serializes a class. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化 `Transportation` 类，该类包含一个名为 `Vehicles` 的字段，该字段返回 。The following example serializes the `Transportation` class, which contains a single field named `Vehicles` that returns an . 该示例首先将 类的两个实例应用于 `Vehicles` 字段，该字段指定 插入到数组中的对象的类型。The example first applies two instances of the class to the `Vehicles` field that specifies the types of objects the inserts into the array. 然后，该示例创建两个 对象来重写应用于 `Vehicles` 属性的特性的行为。The example then creates two objects to override the behavior of the attributes applied to the `Vehicles` property. 两个重写对象被添加到 的 集合。The two overriding objects are added to the collection of an . 最后，该示例将 添加到 ，这允许 将新的对象类型插入 `Vehicles` 字段返回的 中。Lastly, the example adds the to an , allowing the to insert the new object types into the returned by the `Vehicles` field. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttributes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttributes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttributes Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
